scripts.allstart: babel . -d babel_project_task & carex.js -> babel_project_task/carex.js & product.js -> babel_project_task/product.js & node babel_project_task/carex.js & node babel_project_task/product.js
scripts.allwatch: babel . -w -d babel_project_task & carex.js -> babel_project_task/carex.out.js & product.js -> babel_project_task/product.out.js & product.js -> babel_project_task/produt.out.js
